title: Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder shows old column names
OB: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
